channel.title: Closed* Lock*
channel.description: [center][size=24pt]Eclipse-Rsps[/size][/center] [size=8pt]As some of you may know, my last few releases have been apart of the Eclipse-Rsps PvP series. This version however will not be released to the public. I am going to put this online just to see how far it can go ( goal is to have 30 online at one time ). Yes this sounds like a simple goal but i will not be paying for hosting/advertisement. [/size] [size=24pt]The Reason Why[/size] [size=8pt]I am putting this server online because i see to many server's these days that are "pk servers". Back in maybe 2009 or 2008 the deffinition of a pking server was that you PK for your items and that Player Killing was a big part of the server, but that doesnt mean spawn every item and the only thing you can do is PK. I have made the server based on Pking and Skilling for ECP Points. Everytime you level up in a skilling skill ( minning, cooking, fishing, woodcutting, ect. ) you gain 1 ECP. The rates on these skills are 2 though, so it should take fairly long to get a 99 skill. ( roughly 3 hours ). [/size] [size=24pt]The Team Needed[/size] [size=8pt]I will be needing 1.Website Developer 0/1 2.Hoster 1/1 ~Application~ [code]How Old Are You?: What are you applying for?: What time zone are you in?: How long can you be on each day?: Are you familiar with PI?: (hoster) How long can you have the server online per day?: (website Dev) How often can you update the site?:[/code][/size]

item.title: Closed* Lock*
item.dc:creator: @Skillerpk Skillerpk
item.description:
@Skillerpk wrote:

[quote=“eclipse rsps, post:6, topic:451266”][quote author=Skillerpk link=topic=554156.msg4058953#msg4058953 date=1343257991]

How Old Are You?: 18
What time zone are you in?: Eastern
How long can you be on each day?: If i dont work 8 hours
Are you familiar with PI?: Hell yes.
(hoster) How long can you have the server online per day?: 24/7
(website Dev) How often can you update the site?: Not my forte.

=D alienware mx14
4gb ram// 500 hd// intel i5.
great computer
What kind of computer will you be using to host?

[/quote]
Accepted, add me on MSN rick.bo@aol.com[/quote]

added

Read full topic

item.title: Closed* Lock*
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

[center][size=24pt]Eclipse-Rsps[/size][/center]
[size=8pt]As some of you may know, my last few releases have been apart of the Eclipse-Rsps PvP series. This version however will not be released to the public. I am going to put this online just to see how far it can go ( goal is to have 30 online at one time ). Yes this sounds like a simple goal but i will not be paying for hosting/advertisement. [/size]
[size=24pt]The Reason Why[/size]
[size=8pt]I am putting this server online because i see to many server’s these days that are “pk servers”. Back in maybe 2009 or 2008 the deffinition of a pking server was that you PK for your items and that Player Killing was a big part of the server, but that doesnt mean spawn every item and the only thing you can do is PK. I have made the server based on Pking and Skilling for ECP Points. Everytime you level up in a skilling skill ( minning, cooking, fishing, woodcutting, ect. ) you gain 1 ECP. The rates on these skills are 2 though, so it should take fairly long to get a 99 skill. ( roughly 3 hours ). [/size]
[size=24pt]The Team Needed[/size]
[size=8pt]I will be needing
1.Website Developer 0/1
2.Hoster 1/1
~Application~

How Old Are You?: What are you applying for?: What time zone are you in?: How long can you be on each day?: Are you familiar with PI?: (hoster) How long can you have the server online per day?: (website Dev) How often can you update the site?:[/size]
